section:
Castle Ravayne is virtually a city in its own right: the outer courtyard is filled with stables, grain stores, pens for livestock, carpentry yards and a smithy. Nearby, some knights are keeping fighting fit by charging with lances at a straw-filled dummy. Beyond, another line of defences encloses the inner keep.
